entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.ArgumentException when binding pattern matching expression #64399
  • DocumentId's need a way to indicate that they refer to a SourceGenerated document. #64397
  • CSharpChangeNamespaceToMatchFolderCodeFixProvider crash when trying to fix Refit interface #64396
  • Incorrect scoped lifetime inference for out locals #64394
    17.5
  • Support ref scoped for parameter declarations #64393
    C# 12.0
  • StackOverflowException in code analyzer for simple class #64392

Closed

  • [LSP] Missing export for project contexts in TS #63844
    Backlog
  • `CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider` crashes with `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` #63732
  • Design a more general test hook solution for runtime feature flags #63223
    17.4
  • Name simplification is missing on System.IntPtr #61419
    17.4
  • Unexpected warning CS0034: Operator '-' is ambiguous on operand of type 'nuint' and 'int' #63860
    17.5
  • Remove special case in PEModuleSymbol.UseUpdatedEscapeRules for module referencing System.Runtime 7.0 #63691
    17.5
  • Breaking change for methods with multiple refs #64365
    17.4
  • Change value escape of 'out' parameters to ReturnOnly #64155
  • References within `out` parameter should not be considered as potentially escaping #62094
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32929.264 #64387

PullRequests

Created

  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle assert found during IDE LSIF testing #64413
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not report a secondary NFW exception after already reporting one earlier. #64412
    Area-IDE
  • Report warning for unannotated parameters that could be scoped #64410
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Add additional information when we throw an 'unreachable' exception" #64409
    Area-IDE
  • Add tests to verify bug is fixed #64408
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Use required members for option types #64405
    Area-IDE
  • Add instrumentation to investigate flakiness in `ConstantFolding_01` #64404
    Test, Flaky
  • Use save all, instead trying to get dirty indicator #64403
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Truncate helix work item names to work around helix API issues #64411
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • [LSP] Add missing project context handler for ts #64284
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Better handle methods in partial classes that don't have sequence points #64337
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Fix bug where request contexts were not created serially #64406
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Add checks in list wrapping that we don't wrap incomplete separated lists #64407
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add additional information when we throw an 'unreachable' exception #64402
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add tests for local declarations for which we do not support `scoped` keyword. #64401
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Use `TargetFramework.Net70` instead of `RuntimeFlag.ByRefFields` in `CreateCompilation` #64400
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Semantic snippets - don't show in razor documents #64378
    Area-IDE
  • Wait until an analyzer is registered before streaming workspace events over to OOP #64376
    Area-IDE
  • Tweaks to the new unit testing search API. #64395
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64398
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64390
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Capture UIntPtr binary operator resolution break #64353
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Test, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Add non-strict search flag for legacy unit test providers #64375
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64382
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64388
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Bump patch version to 1 for nuget. #64381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make remaining managed pointer type scenarios warnings #64294
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.4
  • Remove special case in PEModuleSymbol.UseUpdatedEscapeRules for module referencing System.Runtime 7.0 #64361
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64384
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64386
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64385
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64383
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2007778 #64310
  • Update localization-suggestion.md #64187
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64417
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64416
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update SymbolDisplay API to include scoped for parameters and locals #64285
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Set starting size for changed text builder using old text #64379
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE
  • Listen to build manager events to know when build is complete #64366
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE
  • Allow TS to derive from the more performant internal API #64258
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid writing `CDATA` to generated targets file #64334
    Area-Compilers
  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Remove TextDocumentState.sourceText #64231
    Area-IDE
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers
